metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel and Minthara enter a morgue full of hideous experiments

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.text: I have seen many a gruesome death, but even I can't fathom some of the horrors inflicted in this supposed 'House of Healing'.

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: You're young, child. If you survive as long as I have, you will witness greater horrors than this.
0.context: NodeContext: explaining harsh truths to Lae'zel, like a mother to a teenage daughter. A little condescending, but kind in her intentions

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: If you are fortunate, you may even inflict greater horrors in the name of your cause.
1.context: NodeContext: with relish and heavy emphasis on 'inflict' because she's shifting from 'witnessing' horrors in the previous node ot inflicting them in this one
